comprehensive_report:
# Comprehensive BaZi Analysis Report

**Gender**: Male | **Age**: 36 | **Birth Year**: 1990

---

## SECTION 1: CHART SETUP

### Four Pillars (四柱)

| | Year (年柱) | Month (月柱) | Day (日柱) | Hour (时柱) |
|---|---|---|---|---|
| **Palace** | Parents/Ancestry | Career/Social | Self/Spouse | Children/Legacy |
| **Heavenly Stem** | 己 (Ji) Earth | 丁 (Ding) Fire | 庚 (Geng) Metal | 辛 (Xin) Metal |
| **Earthly Branch** | 巳 (Si) Fire | 丑 (Chou) Earth | 辰 (Chen) Earth | 巳 (Si) Fire |
| **Hidden Stems** | 丙(75), 庚(25), 戊(10) | 己(75), 癸(25), 辛(10) | 戊(75), 乙(25), 癸(10) | 丙(75), 庚(25), 戊(10) |

### Day Master (日主)

**庚 (Geng) — Metal Yang**

*Geng Metal is the warrior's blade. Cuts through problems, sometimes cuts friends too.*

Personality: decisive, blunt, confrontational, loyal, justice-oriented

### Ten Gods Map (十神)

| Location | Stem | Ten God | Chinese |
|---|---|---|---|
| year_stem | 己 (Ji) | Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 |
| year_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 丙 (Bing) | Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 |
| year_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 庚 (Geng) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| year_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Indirect Resource (IR) | 偏印 |
| month_stem | 丁 (Ding) | Direct Officer (DO) | 正官 |
| month_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 己 (Ji) | Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 |
| month_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 癸 (Gui) | Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 |
| month_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 辛 (Xin) | Rob Wealth (RW) | 劫財 |
| day_stem | 庚 (Geng) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| day_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Indirect Resource (IR) | 偏印 |
| day_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 乙 (Yi) | Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 |
| day_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 癸 (Gui) | Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 |
| hour_stem | 辛 (Xin) | Rob Wealth (RW) | 劫財 |
| hour_branch_primary_qi (hidden) | 丙 (Bing) | Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 |
| hour_branch_hidden_1 (hidden) | 庚 (Geng) | Friend (F) | 比肩 |
| hour_branch_hidden_2 (hidden) | 戊 (Wu) | Indirect Resource (IR) | 偏印 |

---

## SECTION 2: DAY MASTER STRENGTH ASSESSMENT

**Score: 32.3/100** (50 = perfectly balanced)

- Support count: 5.3
- Drain count: 3.1
- Seasonal state: Strengthening
- Verdict: **EXTREMELY STRONG**

*This Day Master has far too much fuel. Energy is excessive — needs heavy draining.*

### Useful God (用神): **Wood** (木)

- Favorable elements: Wood (木), Water (水), Fire (火)
- Unfavorable elements: Metal (金), Earth (土)

---

## SECTION 3: TEN GODS DEEP ANALYSIS (十神)

| Ten God | Chinese | Strength | Visible | Hidden | Locations |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Friend (F) | 比肩 | **PROMINENT** | 1 | 2 | year_branch_hidden_1, day_stem, hour_branch_hidden_1 |
| Rob Wealth (RW) | 劫財 | **PROMINENT** | 1 | 1 | month_branch_hidden_2, hour_stem |
| Eating God (EG) | 食神 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Hurting Officer (HO) | 傷官 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 2 | month_branch_hidden_1, day_branch_hidden_2 |
| Indirect Wealth (IW) | 偏財 | **ABSENT** | 0 | 0 |  |
| Direct Wealth (DW) | 正財 | **HIDDEN_ONLY** | 0 | 1 | day_branch_hidden_1 |
| Seven Killings (7K) | 七殺 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 2 | year_branch_primary_qi, hour_branch_primary_qi |
| Direct Officer (DO) | 正官 | **PRESENT** | 1 | 0 | month_stem |
| Indirect Resource (IR) | 偏印 | **PRESENT** | 0 | 3 | year_branch_hidden_2, day_branch_primary_qi, hour_branch_hidden_2 |
| Direct Resource (DR) | 正印 | **PROMINENT** | 1 | 1 | year_stem, month_branch_primary_qi |

**Friend (比肩)**: Prominent Friend means fierce independence and competition. Wealth is shared or fought over.

**Rob Wealth (劫財)**: Prominent Rob Wealth = money bleeds out. Others take what should be yours.

**Eating God (食神)**: Eating God (食神) is absent — lacks natural creative expression and easy joy.

**Hurting Officer (傷官)**: Hurting Officer (傷官) is present — creative edge with some authority conflicts.

**Indirect Wealth (偏財)**: Indirect Wealth (偏財) is absent — windfall opportunities rare, must earn steadily.

**Direct Wealth (正財)**: Direct Wealth (正財) is present — stable finances and commitment capacity.

**Seven Killings (七殺)**: Seven Killings (七殺) is present — some authority and competitive edge.

**Direct Officer (正官)**: Direct Officer (正官) is present — reasonable discipline and career structure.

**Indirect Resource (偏印)**: Indirect Resource (偏印) is present — some unconventional wisdom and backing.

**Direct Resource (正印)**: Direct Resource (正印) is PROMINENT — strong support system, education, maternal bond, physical health.

### Spouse Star: wife star (正財)

Status: HIDDEN_ONLY. Locations: day_branch_hidden_1

### Children Stars: 7K / DO

### Notable Patterns

- **companion_heavy**: Too many companions (Friend + Rob Wealth) = competition problems, wealth leakage, relationship interference
- **rw_present**: Rob Wealth present = money lost through others, partnerships can drain wealth, competitive spending


---

## SECTION 4: BRANCH INTERACTIONS (地支关系)

### Half Three Harmony (半三合)

- **丑巳半合Metal局 (missing 酉)**
  - Palaces: Year (Parents/Ancestry), Month (Career/Social), Hour (Children/Legacy)
  - Severity: mild

### Destructions (破)

- **丑辰破**
  - Palaces: Month (Career/Social), Day (Self/Spouse)
  - Severity: mild


---

## SECTION 5: SHEN SHA FULL AUDIT (神煞)

### Present Stars

| Star | Chinese | Location | Palace | Nature | Severity | Void? |
|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|
| Heavenly Noble | 天乙贵人 | Chou | month | auspicious | mild |  |
| Tai Ji Noble | 太极贵人 | Chou | month | auspicious | mild |  |
| Heavenly Virtue | 天德贵人 | Geng | day | auspicious | mild |  |
| Monthly Virtue | 月德贵人 | Geng | day | auspicious | mild |  |
| Heavenly Happiness | 天喜 | Chen | day | auspicious | mild |  |
| Canopy Star | 华盖 | Chou | month | mixed | mild |  |
| Canopy Star | 华盖 | Chen | day | mixed | mild |  |
| Earth's Snare | 地网 | Si | year | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Earth's Snare | 地网 | Chen | day | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Earth's Snare | 地网 | Si | year | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Widow Star | 寡宿 | Chen | day | inauspicious | moderate |  |
| Ten Evils Great Defeat | 十恶大败 |  |  | inauspicious | severe |  |
| Kui Gang | 魁罡 |  |  | mixed | moderate |  |
| Strangle Star | 绞 | Chen | day | inauspicious | moderate |  |

### Derivation Details

- **天乙贵人 (Heavenly Noble)**: For Geng DM: Tian Yi at 丑 (Chou). Found in month palace.
  - *Tian Yi present = a guardian angel energy. People naturally want to help you.*
- **太极贵人 (Tai Ji Noble)**: For Geng DM: Tai Ji at 丑. In month.
  - *Tai Ji Noble — spiritual intelligence. Natural affinity for metaphysics and wisdom.*
- **天德贵人 (Heavenly Virtue)**: For 丑 month: Tian De = Geng. PRESENT.
  - *Heavenly Virtue — moral protection. Reduces severity of misfortune.*
- **月德贵人 (Monthly Virtue)**: For 丑 month: Yue De = 庚. PRESENT.
  - *Monthly Virtue — secondary protection layer. Softens monthly negative events.*
- **天喜 (Heavenly Happiness)**: For 巳 year: Tian Xi at 辰. PRESENT.
  - *Heavenly Happiness — joy and celebration energy.*
- **华盖 (Canopy Star)**: For year branch 巳: Hua Gai at 丑. In month.
  - *Hua Gai present = the hermit's star. Deep thinker, but lonely unless embraced.*
- **华盖 (Canopy Star)**: For day branch 辰: Hua Gai at 辰. In day.
  - *Canopy Star — solitary, spiritual, intellectual. Prefers isolation over crowds.*
- **地网 (Earth's Snare)**: 巳 in year palace = Earth's Snare (地网).
  - *Earth's Snare — grounded but trapped. Difficulty escaping situations.*
- **地网 (Earth's Snare)**: 辰 in day palace = Earth's Snare (地网).
  - *Earth's Snare — grounded but trapped. Difficulty escaping situations.*
- **地网 (Earth's Snare)**: 巳 in year palace = Earth's Snare (地网).
  - *Earth's Snare — grounded but trapped. Difficulty escaping situations.*
- **寡宿 (Widow Star)**: For 巳 year: Gua Su at 辰. PRESENT.
  - *Widow Star — loneliness in relationships, especially for females.*
- **十恶大败 (Ten Evils Great Defeat)**: Day Pillar 庚辰: IS a Ten Evils day.
  - *Ten Evils Great Defeat — historical marker for extreme misfortune with wealth.*
- **魁罡 (Kui Gang)**: Day Pillar 庚辰: IS a Kui Gang day.
  - *Kui Gang — powerful, commanding, but hard on relationships and self.*
- **绞 (Strangle Star)**: Year 巳: Strangle at 辰. PRESENT.
  - *Strangle Star — suffocating situations, trapped in conflicts.*

### Notable Absences

- **天乙贵人 (Heavenly Noble)**: No Heavenly Noble = less natural protection. Must build own safety nets.
- **文昌贵人 (Academic Star)**: No Academic Star. Education success requires more effort.
- **禄神 (Prosperity Star)**: No Prosperity Star = wealth must be actively fought for.
- **将星 (General Star)**: No General Star = must build authority from scratch.
- **天医 (Heavenly Doctor)**: No Heavenly Doctor = health needs more active management.
- **红鸾 (Red Phoenix)**: No Red Phoenix = romance comes later or with less intensity.


---

### Career & Authority

### Character & Behavior (6 indicators)

---

## SECTION 7: CURRENT LUCK PILLAR ANALYSIS (大运)

No luck pillar provided.


---

## SECTION 8: HEALTH ANALYSIS (健康)

### Element Balance

| Element | Count | Status | Organs at Risk |
|---|---|---|---|
| Wood (木) | 0.2 | DEFICIENT | fatigue, poor vision, weak tendons, indecisiveness |
| Fire (火) | 2.5 | Balanced | — |
| Earth (土) | 2.7 | EXCESS | overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry |
| Metal (金) | 2.6 | EXCESS | grief, skin problems, respiratory tightness, constipation |
| Water (水) | 0.3 | DEFICIENT | lower back pain, weak bones, hearing loss, infertility, premature aging |

### Organ Systems at Risk

- **Wood DEFICIENT**: Liver (肝) and Gallbladder (胆) weakened. Watch for: fatigue, poor vision, weak tendons, indecisiveness. Body parts affected: eyes, tendons, nails.
- **Earth EXCESS**: Spleen (脾) and Stomach (胃) overloaded. Watch for: overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry. Body parts affected: mouth, muscles, flesh.
- **Metal EXCESS**: Lungs (肺) and Large Intestine (大肠) overloaded. Watch for: grief, skin problems, respiratory tightness, constipation. Body parts affected: nose, skin, body hair.
- **Water DEFICIENT**: Kidneys (肾) and Bladder (膀胱) weakened. Watch for: lower back pain, weak bones, hearing loss, infertility, premature aging. Body parts affected: ears, bones, reproductive system.

### Health-Related Stars

- **天德贵人 (Heavenly Virtue)**: Heavenly Virtue — moral protection. Reduces severity of misfortune.
- **月德贵人 (Monthly Virtue)**: Monthly Virtue — secondary protection layer. Softens monthly negative events.


---

## SECTION 9: REMEDIES & WHAT MUST CHANGE

### 9a. Elemental Remedies

**Useful God Element: Wood (木)**

- **Colors to wear**: green, emerald, jade green
- **Colors to avoid**: white, gold, silver
- **Favorable directions**: East, Southeast, North, South
- **Industries**: education, publishing, forestry, fashion, health food
- **Environment**: plants, especially tall leafy ones, wooden furniture

### 9b. Behavioral Changes

- Channel excess energy into productive output (creative work, exercise).
- Practice patience and listening. Your strength can bulldoze others.
- Give more than you take. Generosity balances your chart.

### 9c. Relationship Guidance

- Best partner element alignment: Wood (木)
- Your spouse palace (Day Branch): 辰 (Chen)

### 9d. Financial Strategy

- Wealth element (Wood) can be handled. Take calculated risks in favorable years.

### 9e. Relocation & Environment

- Crossing Water benefit: **MODERATE** (score: 3/5)
  - Water is a favorable element for this chart
  - Water element severely depleted (count: 0.3)
  - Fire+Earth dominance (2.5+2.7) needs Water to balance
- Ideal climate: warm and humid, with abundant vegetation
- Ideal geography: forested areas, near parks and greenery

**This chart moderately benefits from crossing water. Living near water or abroad will significantly help.**


---

## SECTION 11: HONEST SUMMARY

### Core Life Lesson

*You have abundant energy but it needs direction. Your lesson is channeling power into productive outlets rather than letting it stagnate.*

### Designed For vs. Fighting Against

This chart is designed to thrive with **Wood** energy — education type environments.

The biggest fight is against excessive **Metal** energy, which stagnates this chart.

### The Single Most Important Thing

**Balance is everything.** Your chart has real strengths but also real vulnerabilities. The useful god (Wood) must be consistently present in your environment, career, and relationships. When it is, everything flows. When it isn't, problems compound.

items.label: Liver (肝) (Wood)
items.value: Wood severely deficient (3%). fatigue, poor vision, weak tendons, indecisiveness. Wood in Trapped (囚) seasonal state — heightened liver vulnerability. Body parts: eyes, tendons, nails.

items.label: Heart (心) (Fire)
items.value: Fire above average (30%). Watch for: anxiety, insomnia, heart palpitations, inflammation. Water controls Fire. Weak Water means cardiovascular system (Heart) can become unregulated. Body parts: tongue, blood vessels, complexion.

items.label: Spleen (脾) (Earth)
items.value: Earth above average (32%). Watch for: overthinking, bloating, weight gain, obsessive worry. Wood controls Earth. Weak Wood means digestive system (Spleen/Stomach) can become unregulated. Body parts: mouth, muscles, flesh.

items.label: Lungs (肺) (Metal)
items.value: Metal above average (31%). Watch for: grief, skin problems, respiratory tightness, constipation. Body parts: nose, skin, body hair.

items.label: Kidneys (肾) (Water)
items.value: Water severely deficient (4%). lower back pain, weak bones, hearing loss, infertility, premature aging. Water in Dead (死) seasonal state — heightened kidneys vulnerability. Body parts: ears, bones, reproductive system.

sections.title: Honest Summary
sections.text: You are Geng Metal (庚金). Personality: decisive, blunt, confrontational, loyal, justice-oriented. Your Day Master is extremely strong (35% element presence, 20% = balanced). You have overwhelming energy. The risk is stagnation and bulldozing over others. Marriage: No major obstacles in the natal chart. Timing and luck pillar alignment will determine when. Wealth: Rob Wealth is prominent — money comes but also leaves through others. Avoid partnerships and lending. Protect what you earn. Health: Watch Liver (Wood), Kidneys (Water) — these elements are deficient in your chart. Life lesson: You have abundant energy but it needs direction. Your lesson is channeling power into productive outlets rather than letting it stagnate. Your useful god is Wood (currently at 2.1% — most deficient). Adding Wood brings the chart closest to 20% equilibrium across all five elements. Favorable: Wood, Water, Fire. Unfavorable: Metal, Earth (already excessive). Everything in your life improves when you increase Wood element exposure.
